snippet.title: K-Hawk: Survival Instinct (2002) - PC Gameplay / Win 7 on Win 10 (VMware Workstation 12)
snippet.description:
K-Hawk: Survival Instinct (2002) - PC Gameplay / Win 7 on Win 10 (VMware Workstation 12)

Subscribe here ►►► http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=FirstPlaysHD
Also SHARE, COMMENT, LIKE ☺

In this Action-Adventure, players find themselves in the role of Kitty Hawk, a helicopter pilot who is shot down on an island in the Pacific. During this vicious attack, her boyfriend, Major Jeffrey, is killed. From this moment on, it is Kitty against the world. Armed only with a pistol, she sets off to find the culprit of her boyfriend`s (and helicopter`s) demise. Desperate for help, she makes contact with headquarters, but as long as enemy air defence is in place over the island, they can not send reinforcements. During the course of her mission, Kitty crosses paths with an unscrupulous colonel, who, she finds out, is responsible for the downing of her helicopter and the death of her boyfriend. Together with his scientists, the Colonel is up to even more evil than meets the eye.



░▒▓ PC Hardware ▓▒░

CPU: Intel Core i7 3770K @ 4.20 Ghz
RAM: 16 GB
GPU: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970
OS:  Windows 10 64bit


░▒▓ Recording HW/SW ▓▒░

Nvidia Shadowplay
